Html: My OS is Windows 7 Home Premium, I have the Windows 7 SDK, and I'm using Visual Studio Professional. However, whenever I add the Ribbon to my form, I only get a white box with a line down the middle and a line across the middle. Whenever I try to compile the project, there is just a white space where the ribbon should be. I copied the XML file from one of the examples, but nothing has changed. Then I tried copying the Program.vb file. Again, no change. Any help?

During design time there is only a place holder. The ribbon will be shown
only during runtime. So everything seems to be normal.
Oh, sorry! I always forget to read the documentation... Thank you!
